availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Headquartered at Louisville, Kentucky. Established by the Kentucky General Assembly in 1834. Lexington branch established in April 1835. Closed in March 1865 and succeeded by the First National Bank of Kentucky.

bibl.p: Lexington History Museum, "Bank of Kentucky (Second)," (http://lexhistory.org/wikilex/bank-kentucky-second) (accessed June 2, 2017); William M. Ambrose, "First Security National Bank & Trust Company 1835-1992," (Lexington: Limestone Press, 2007).
